inclusion.criterion: admitted gastroenterology unit at Assuit University Children Hospital
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: chronic diarrhea due to malignancy & chemotherapy
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has been experiencing dizziness and severe diarrhea since yesterday, with a history of living in a camp in Sudan for a month. V. cholerae was seen in dark-field microscopy of a fresh stool specimen.
